description: This file defines API routes for quiz-related operations such as starting a quiz and submitting answers, using FastAPI. It interacts with database models like Quiz, Question, and Attempt, and utilizes dependency injection for user authentication and database sessions.

classes.name: QuizOut
classes.description: Schema for returning quiz metadata without answers.

classes.name: QuizQuestionOut
classes.description: Schema for quiz question details without correct options.

classes.name: QuizResult
classes.description: Schema representing the result of a quiz submission.

classes.name: User
classes.description: User model used for authentication and tracking.

classes.name: Quiz
classes.description: Content model representing quiz metadata and questions.

classes.name: Attempt
classes.description: Tracking model for user quiz attempts.

methods.name: start_quiz(module_id: int, _: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint to start a quiz for a specific module, returning quiz questions.

methods.name: submit_quiz( quiz_id: int, payload: QuizSubmitRequest, user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: API endpoint to submit quiz answers and calculate the score.

ctags.name: start_quiz
ctags.pattern: /^def start_quiz(module_id: int, _: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db/
ctags.signature: (module_id: int, _: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: submit_quiz
ctags.signature: ( quiz_id: int, payload: QuizSubmitRequest, user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
